summary: Leo, a young man coming to terms with his own sexuality, runs into Caro, a primary school friend he fancied when they were kids, who's now trying to ward off her own personal demons. This ... See full summary »
cast: Martín Rodríguez|Cecilia Cósero|Gerardo Begérez|Arturo Goetz|Mirella Pascual|Rafael Soliwoda|Carolina Alarcón|César Troncoso|Leonor Svarcas|Sylvia Murninkas|Sebastián Serantes|Pablo Dive|Diego Arbelo|María Victoria Césperes|Ana Pouso|Mario Blanco|Mario Buchichio|Olga Cor|Andrés De Armas|Diego Firpo|Julián Goyoaga|Martín Klein|Luciano Macedo|Andrés Papaleo|Fabrizio Roberto|Selva|Tomás
title: El cuarto de Leo
